channel.title: Launch on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Launch on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Northrop Grumman’s new spacecraft is a real chonker
item.description: “We’re excited that Northrop is ready to deliver this incredibly beneficial increase in capacity.”

item.title: Pentagon begins deploying new satellite network to link sensors with shooters
item.description: “This is the first time we’ll have a space layer fully integrated into our warfighting operations.”

item.title: SpaceX’s lesson from last Starship flight? “We need to seal the tiles.”
item.description: SpaceX is targeting an orbital Starship flight with a next-gen vehicle next year.

item.title: Lull in Falcon Heavy missions opens window for SpaceX to build new landing pads
item.description: There are no Falcon Heavy launches this year, so now’s the time for SpaceX to act.

item.title: Fuel supply is a bottleneck for Starship—here’s how SpaceX will get around it
item.description: SpaceX has flirted with the idea of propellant generation plants at Starbase before.

item.title: Rocket Report: SpaceX achieved daily launch this week; ULA recovers booster
item.description: Firefly Aerospace reveals why its Alpha booster exploded after launch in April.

item.title: Under pressure after setbacks, SpaceX’s huge rocket finally goes the distance
item.description: This was the first successful flight of SpaceX’s second-generation Starship after three failures.

item.title: With Starship, SpaceX encounters an obstacle that haunted NASA’s space shuttles
item.description: “We wish we were young again and NASA was this vivacious, you know?”

item.title: Time is running out for SpaceX to make a splash with second-gen Starship
item.description: SpaceX is gearing up for another Starship launch after three straight disappointing test flights.

item.title: US military’s X-37B spaceplane stays relevant with launch of another mission
item.description: The X-37B spaceplane is flying missions few would have foreseen when the program began.

item.title: China’s Guowang megaconstellation is more than another version of Starlink
item.description: “This is a strategy to keep the US from intervening… that’s what their space architecture is designed to do.”

item.title: SpaceX reveals why the last two Starships failed as another launch draws near
item.description: “SpaceX can now proceed with Starship Flight 10 launch operations under its current license.”

item.title: Trump orders cull of regulations governing commercial rocket launches
item.description: The head of the FAA’s commercial spaceflight division will become a political appointee.

item.title: After first operational launch, here’s the next big test for ULA’s Vulcan rocket
item.description: This launch was a big success, but it doesn’t necessarily quash anxieties about ULA’s ability to deliver.

item.title: Space Force officials take secrecy to new heights ahead of key rocket launch
item.description: This will be the first national security mission to fly on United Launch Alliance’s Vulcan rocket.

item.title: Australia’s first orbital-class rocket stalled seconds after liftoff
item.description: “I thought best case was maybe 40 seconds of flight time, but I’ll take 14 as a win.”

item.title: SpaceX launches a pair of NASA satellites to probe the origins of space weather
item.description: “This is going to really help us understand how to predict space weather in the magnetosphere.”

item.title: Amazon’s ride on the rocket merry-go-round continues with SpaceX launch
item.description: Amazon has launched 78 of its planned 3,232 Kuiper broadband satellites.

item.title: Rocket Report: SpaceX to make its own propellant; China’s largest launch pad
item.description: United Launch Alliance begins stacking its third Vulcan rocket for the second time.
